titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that a convention or association of churches includes individuals (with or without voting rights) as well as churches.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that a convention or association of churches includes individuals (with or without voting rights) as well as churches.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue to define a convention or association of churches to include individuals (with or without voting rights) as well as churches.
